sub_title: SparkOptimus | INSEAD MIM'21 | Digital Strategy Consultant
summary:
Digital & Data | Strategy | Sustainability

Strategy consultant with 3+ years of consulting and entrepreneurial experience, including 2 years at a leading digital strategy consulting firm in the Netherlands. Successfully executed digital strategy, digital transformation, due diligence and corporate venture projects across fashion, retail, finance, consumer goods, construction, automation and energy industries.

Passion to address customer needs and solving them with agile rhythms, focusing on key objectives, building amazing teams and quickly adapting to new insights.

Currently an Associate at SparkOptimus in Amsterdam, helping clients realize their digital ambitions by building clear & pragmatic strategies based on data-driven insights. 

Prior to that, co-founded a (funded) AI-based, discount-driven e-commerce startup in India and an education consulting startup in France., followed by a Master in Management from INSEAD. 

Passionate about chess (2023 3rd Division Rapid Chess champion of Amsterdam, ~1600 ELO rating) and Web3. 

Let's connect! Send me an email to: deepayan.roy@insead.edu or shoot me a DM on LinkedIn

profile_positions.description: Responsible for organizing the INSEAD Strategy Forum 2023 as part of the Strategy Forum commitee
profile_positions.title: Member, INSEAD NAA NL Events Committee

profile_positions.description:
• Strategized, built and scaled digital use cases to re-activate ecommerce consumers for a $9Bn international fashion player
• Re-shaped DtC and e-commerce channel strategy for a global $7Bn coffee and beverage giant
• Benchmarked global digital B2B portal for a $34Bn energy management company against its competitors worldwide
• Executed full commercial due diligence of one of Netherlands’ largest mergers within IT managed services
• Created global commercial acceleration plan of a corporate venture for a $10Bn construction equipment supplier
• Supported idea-to-launch of Refugeework.nl, the Dutch national job portal for refugees


Set up in 2010 by a group of former McKinsey consultants, SparkOptimus has quickly grown to become the #1 digital strategy consultancy in Europe having led on 900+ pure digital projects over the past 10 years. SparkOptimus was voted the best digital strategy consultancy in Netherlands by Emerce for six times in a row due to its clear focus on jointly designing the ‘why’ (vision in a digital age), the ‘what’ (customer proposition, technology, organization) and the 'how' (getting it done).

As Associate, I work with global companies and drive digital transformation initiatives helping my clients thrive and lead in the digital age
profile_positions.title: Digital Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Students struggling to prepare and manage their applications for Masters programs may look no further. We are a group of recent admits to top schools around the globe and we are here to offer our experience and skills to help you achieve admits to your dream school.

At MastersGuru, I was a Self-reflection coach and GMAT Trainer.
• Led a team of 8 consultants and advised 29 clients from Sweden, France, Italy, India, and China
• Designed lead-generation strategies and boosted conversion rate from 2.1% to 18.9% in 6 months
• Expanded GMATCoach product line by 250% in 2 months using Agile methodology and Scrum framework
profile_positions.title: Founder Consultant & GMAT Coach

profile_positions.description:
UEM Kolkata Toastmasters Club brings great people together and helps them grow in the avenues of public speaking and leadership, by providing a positive and supportive learning environment. I initiated proceedings of the Club with the help of my great mentors, Archita Tiwary and Rohan Nag. 
Thankful to be involved with such a wonderful team! 
UEM Toastmasters Club has played a great role in enhancing my public speaking and leadership skills.
Update: Achieved 1st Position in Toastmasters International Speech Contest 2019 (Area Level)
profile_positions.title: Charter President

profile_positions.description:
What started as a coffee table conversation is now a registered organization with a mission to eliminate world food wastage and provide the poorer sections of the society with high-quality affordable groceries. 
Baskett provides solutions to retailers, wholesalers and distributors to vend off fruits, vegetables & groceries that are nearing the end of their shelf life at optimal prices so that:
- Retailers can cover their losses that they accrue from unsold perished groceries.
- Customers can buy F&V and other groceries at jaw-dropping discounts
- Food wastage is virtually eliminated!

We received our first round of funding from Instade LLP. and IEM-UEM Trust in 2018, amounting to a total of INR 65,000 ($950). We love our investors, who have mentored us throughout this wonderful journey. 
(Company link in description)

Update: Awarded "UEM Entrepreneur of the Year 2019" for my startup.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
•	Working alongside an enthusiastic Secretariat, I played an important role in founding UEM Model United Nations and the UEMMUN Club, to promote awareness about International politics and develop leaders of the future. 
•	As Secretary General of UEM Model United Nations 2019, I presided over the entire event. My job role was to focus on smooth functioning of three committees: 
1. United Nations General Assembly - Disarmament and International Security Committtee (UNGA-DISEC)
2. United Nations Commission on the Status of Women (UNCSW)
3. United Nations Security Council (UNSC)
•	Apart from overseeing the committees, my responsibilities also included conference logistics, planning and budgeting, recruiting staff and inviting colleges and schools. I received great assistance from the UEMMUN Secretariat throughout the process. 
I'm fortunate to have been appointed by the UEMMUN Secretariat for such a responsible and prestigious post!
profile_positions.title: Secretary General

volunteer_experiences.role: Caissa Chess Club Team Captain - SchaakGrootAmsterdam (SGA) Chess Tournament 2023

company.name: Hamdan Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Award for Distinguished Academic Performance

volunteer_experiences.description:
In today's world, I believe that economic empowerment plays a great role in providing personal freedom and in emancipation of individuals from variegated socio-cultural barriers. With this motivation, I hosted workshops in non-profits and homes for the elderly in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, explaining different governmental schemes of economic empowerment with a special emphasis on creating small businesses for women and the disabled. 
My humble efforts were acknowledged by the Government of Dubai when I was awarded the prestigious Sheikh Hamdan Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Award for Distinguished Academic Performance, in recognition of the services of economic empowerment I and my team rendered to the city and to the nation.

I am a firm believer of the fact that science & technology has and will continue to enrich the lives of humans around the globe. The thing to keep in mind, however, is that this growth be in tandem with a sustainable environment. Recognizing my confidence, the Government of Dubai appointed me the Youth Ambassador for Dubai's bid for Expo 2020, a bold vision of a city reinventing itself to become the world's hotspot for business, social, technological and environmental innovation. My team's efforts were handsomely rewarded when Dubai won the EXPO 2020 bid! Since then, I've been working tirelessly with my Innovation Team for promoting large-scale scientific & technological projects in the build-up of the Expo, most notably the "3D Dubai Initiative", which targets that one-quarter of buildings of Dubai be 3D printed by 2025.

volunteer_experiences.role: Junior Campaign Leader - The Neighborhood Recycling Project
volunteer_experiences.description: "The Earth is what we all have in common". Only with a conscious and collective effort can the planet's resources be saved for future generations. And what better way to promote sustainability than recycling? With this motivation, I joined the Emirates Environmental Group (EEG) in 2011. I've had some amazing experiences with EEG since then. In 2012, I was selected as Campaign Leader for the Neighborhood Recycling Project 2012. Through this project, I not only gave away more than 500 Kgs of paper, plastic and aluminium cans, but also got the opportunity to spread the word of the importance of recycling. Thank you EEG for the wonderful experience!

company.name: Sharjah Commerce and Tourism Development Authority

volunteer_experiences.description: Played an instrumental role in creating a collaborative network of national museums and heritage centers across Sharjah, UAE to promote the culture and heritage of the region, leading to greater cultural awareness and higher tourist revenues. My commitment to excellence was rewarded by the Government of Sharjah when I was awarded the Sharjah Excellence Award 2013 in the Under-18 category.

I headed the Student Council for the academic year 2014-15. As Head Boy, my role was to oversee various modes of student operations such as event coordination, drafting the Year Book, etc. Under my leadership, the school achieved many awards such as the prestigious Khalifa Award for Excellence in Educational and Institutional Performance 2014. During this period, I got to work in the shadows of my school's visionary principal, Ms. Vandana Marwaha, who taught me, among other things, that the pride of past laurels should never cloud my ability to take prudent decisions for the future.
